column1:
Donald Trumps latest proposal to renew his call to ban Muslims from entering the U.S, 0, 15
as well as ban immigration from countries like the Philippines shows once again that he is temperamentally unfit and unqualified to be president, 15, 38
As a proud Filipino American I am deeply concerned that families like mine who immigrated from the Philippines would have been the target of Trumps reckless and baseless policy proposals, 38, 68
They and many other immigrants have made valuable contributions to society and make our nation stronger, 68, 84
Hillary Clintonxa0 xa0to fight for comprehensive immigration reform and to reunite families knowing that Filipinos have some of the longest visa wait times: up to 23 years in many cases
Hillary knows that America is a country of immigrants and understands that we are a stronger country when we come together."
